title: Mocha Cocoa
directions: Layer in a jar. Add a tag that says “Mix contents in a large bowl. For each serving, place 1/3 cup cocoa mix in a mug and stir in 1 cup boiling water. Store remaining mix in airtight container.” Serves 12.
ingredients: 1 cup powdered milk or powdered creamer
1/2 cup chopped bittersweet or semi-sweet chocolate or miniature chocolate chips
